document_data.name: ''Heroes of the Realms''
document_data.creator: [[Gunder Gaewilder]] & [[Relvan Gaewilder]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Heroes of the Realms''''' was a line of [[clay]] model figures depicting various renowned [[adventurer]]s. They were made in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]],{{Cite organized play/LC/Fire's Eye|9}}<ref group="note" name="power">Given the examples of adventurers given within ''Fire's Eye'', it's possible that the adventurers covered by the line was limited to those who were renowned within [[the Vast]]. each figure being custom made, by the [[Toysmiths]] toy business in [[Ravens Bluff]].{{Cite organized play/LC/Tears of Selûne|23}}
document_data.History: Sometime in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a group of adventurer friends of [[Dawn of the Desert Moon]] and [[Opal Starlight]] donated ''Heroes of the Realms'' figures to their shelter for orphaned youth, the [[Desert Moon Sanctuary And Starlight Cavalcade]]. These figures included personages of the [[druid]] [[Morra Starson]]{{Cite organized play/LC/Fire's Eye|10}}
